items.name: Fridge Filler Mixed
items.desc:
A Mixed 6 pack containing:
x3 Headband Pale Ale 5.5% ABV
x3 Lightbulb Extra Pale Ale 4.5% ABV
All 440ml Cans
24hr delivery service from your beers leaving the brewery, not from placing your order. Please ensure your delivery details are correct at checkout. Orders placed after 12PM Thur will be dispatched the following week.
For free Local delivery, if you want your beers to arrive before the weekend, please place your order prior to 9AM Thursday. A member of the team will be delivering these orders on Thur & Friday.

items.name: Headband Pale Ale
items.desc:
6 cans of Headband Pale Ale 5.5% ABV
A favourite in the brewery and apart from small continual tweaks here and there, it remains extremely close to the 2014 pilot brews and 2015 release version. The use of dual yeast strains brings both a clean crispness to the finish and juicy peach aromatics. A touch of medium crystal and some superstar hops results in a satisfyingly orange hue that marries up to strong orange citrus notes.
24hr delivery service from your beers leaving the brewery, not from placing your order. Orders placed after 12PM Thur will be dispatched the following week.
For free Local delivery, if you want your beers to arrive before the weekend, please place your order prior to 9AM Thursday. A member of the team will be delivering these orders on Thur & Friday.

items.name: Maybe One More PSI DIPA
items.desc:
6 Cans of Maybe One More PSI DIPA.
Think of berries. Think of stone fruit. Think of pine needles. Think of a 1970s squash club changing room (sweaty). That’s Mosaic… 'Maybe One More PSI?’ is a single hop Vermont style showcase. If you don’t like Mosaic hops then you won’t like this beer.
24hr delivery service from your beers leaving the brewery, not from placing your order. Orders placed after 12PM Thur will be dispatched the following week.
For free Local delivery, if you want your beers to arrive before the weekend, please place your order prior to 9AM Thursday. A member of the team will be delivering these orders on Thur & Friday.

items.name: Rustling Substance Pale Ale
items.desc:
6 cans of Rustling Substance Pale Ale.
The 5.2% pale returns with layered up malts, silky oats and lashings of Citra and Motueka hops. A chorus of citrus fruits that culminates with a creamy lime tang and soft grapefruit bite!
24hr delivery service from your beers leaving the brewery, not from placing your order. Orders placed after 12PM Thur will be dispatched the following week.
For free Local delivery, if you want your beers to arrive before the weekend, please place your order prior to 9AM Thursday. A member of the team will be delivering these orders on Thur & Friday.

items.name: Solid State IPA
items.desc:
6 cans of Solid State.
A creamy, massively tropical, and punchy collaboration with Yakima Chief Hops! A festival of Cryo and T90 hops whacked into a 6.5% IPA. A bit of first for us, and a really exciting opportunity to team up with one the world's finest purveyors of all things dank, green & delicious.
24hr delivery service from your beers leaving the brewery, not from placing your order. Please ensure your delivery details are correct at checkout.
Orders placed after 12PM Thur will be dispatched the following week.

items.name: Unknown Worlds Pale Ale
items.desc:
6 Cans of Unknown Worlds Pale Ale.
We’ve taken one of our base pale ale recipes and excessively hopped it on the cold side with Amarillo, BRU-1 & Comet for a crushable 5.2% offering loaded with orange, pineapple & zesty grapefruit flavours!
24hr delivery service from your beers leaving the brewery, not from placing your order. Orders placed after 12PM Thur will be dispatched the following week.
For free Local delivery, if you want your beers to arrive before the weekend, please place your order prior to 9AM Thursday. A member of the team will be delivering these orders on Thur & Friday.
